subject: Your loan request approved
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$268,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this simple form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!!
http://lonhqjational.com/
